archimate:ArchimateModel.name: NordicSmartGovernment
archimate:ArchimateModel.purpose:
The Reference Archietecture for Nordic Smart Government
This is an archimate-representation of the roles, services, use-cases and relationships covered in the business case and stakeholder analysis for "nordic smart government", augmented with some basic assumptions about applications and application functions.
The detailed objects in the model are under "model content", while archimate views are under "views". Good places to start are: * Views - Business processes, functions and roles - Business Roles - Roles * Views - Application functions, processes - Application processes - Accounting * Views - Information architecture * Views - Application functions, processes - Application processes - Analysis
